column2: the hostess on Wed was not very nice to us. For every table she led customers to
column3: she'd lay out the menus in front of each place setting
column4: but she simply tossed the 3 menus onto the center of the table for us. (No
column5: the place was not busy since it was past the lunch hour rush.) She did
column7: say "Have a good day" when we left.
